AT.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
AT.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. ist ein neues Strategie-Spiel für Nintendo 3DS und 2DS von Intelligent Systems, die sich mit den Serien Fire Emblem und Advance Wars einen Namen gemacht haben. Das Spiel bietet eine unverwechselbare Atmosphäre, eine Steampunk-Kulisse und eine Grafik im Comic-Stil. Der Spieler wählt vier Mitglieder eines Agenten-Teams aus, die ganz eigenartige Persönlichkeiten haben, um sich gegen Außerirdische zur Wehr zu setzen, die den Planeten erobern wollen. Angeführt wird die Truppe vom 16. Präsidenten der Vereinigten Staaten von Amerika, Abraham Lincoln. Unter amiibo.nintendo.eu finden Sie eine Liste kompatibler amiibo™ und aktuelle Informationen. Um amiibo auf Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- und Nintendo 2DS-Systemen zu benutzen, wird ein Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät benötigt. Das Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät wird im Verlauf dieses Jahres erhältlich sein.

movies.name: Code name: S.T.E.A.M.: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart
Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.: Mitsing-Video

AU.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
AU.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. is a new strategy game for Nintendo 3DS and 2DS from Intelligent Systems, known for the Fire Emblem and Advance Wars series. The game has a unique atmosphere with a steampunk setting and comic book-style graphics. The player selects four members from a team of agents, each with their own unique personalities – led by the 16th president of the United States of America, Abraham Lincoln – to fight back against aliens invading the planet. Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required. The Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer will be available later this year.

BR.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
BR.description: Comande um time de ataque que possui heróis inesperados, criado pelo próprio Abraham Lincoln para defender a Terra de uma invasão alienígena! Domine o poder do vapor para surpreender e aniquilar os inimigos neste jogo estelar que mistura estratégia e ação em turnos. Somente você pode defraudar e superar o poder de fogo desta ameaça de outro mundo. Acabem com eles, agentes! Toque na tela tátil do console New Nintendo 3DS™ XL ou no acessório leitor/gravador NFC Nintendo 3DS com qualquer personagem de Fire Emblem™ da série de amiibo de Super Smash Bros.™ para adicioná-lo à sua equipe e usá-lo nas batalhas! Batalhe por todo o mundo, em campos de batalhas infestados de extraterrestes ao usar um time customizado de quatro membros que inclui heróis como John Henry, Tom Sawyer e... o leão de Oz?! Cada personagem tem armas e habilidades únicas. É necessário gerenciar estrategicamente o medidor de vapor de cada jogador para trocar de turnos no momento certo, fazer emboscadas e contra-atacar. Depende de você escolher a melhor forma de usar o poder que está em suas mãos para desempenhar atos heroicos. É Lincoln vs. alienígenas… eu não gostaria de ser os alienígenas. Confira o tema inspirado neste jogo, na loja de temas. Basta tocar no ícone no canto superior esquerdo do menu HOME do seu Nintendo 3DS para começar.

The game has a unique atmosphere with a steampunk setting and comic book-style graphics. The player selects four members from a team of agents, each with their own unique personalities – led by the 16th president of the United States of America, Abraham Lincoln – to fight back against aliens invading the planet. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required. The Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer will be available later this year.

BE.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
BE.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. est un nouveau jeu de stratégie sur Nintendo 3DS et 2DS signé Intelligent Systems, qu'on connait pour être à l'origine des séries Fire Emblem et Advance Wars. Ce jeu possède une atmosphère unique mêlant le style steampunk aux graphismes de BD. Le joueur choisit quatre membres parmi une équipe d'agents, chacun possédant sa propre personnalité, qui seront menés par le 16e président des États Unis d'Amérique, Abraham Lincoln, pour combattre une invasion d'aliens sur la planète. Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS. Le lecteur/enregistreur NFC pour Nintendo 3DS sera disponible dans le courant de l'année.

movies.name: Code name: S.T.E.A.M. : bande-annonce de lancement
Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.: Bande-annonce en chanson

CA.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
CA.description: Command a strike team of unexpected heroes - assembled by Abraham Lincoln himself - to defend Earth against an alien invasion! Harness the power of steam to scout, surprise, and annihilate enemies in this star-spangled blend of turn-based strategy and action gameplay. Only you can outwit and outgun this otherworldly threat. Take ‘em out, agents! From the creators of the critically-acclaimed Fire Emblem and Advance Wars series comes a new take on tactical strategy. Battle through globe-spanning, alien-infested battlefields using a customizable four-member team comprised of diverse characters including folk-hero John Henry, Tom Sawyer and.. the lion from Oz!? Each character has a unique weapon and ability, so you’ll have to strategically manage their steam gauges as you take cover, set up ambushes, and unleash counter-attacks. It’s up to you to decide the best way to use your available steam power to perform heroic actions. It’s Lincoln vs aliens… and I wouldn’t want to be the aliens. Check out the theme inspired by this game in the Theme Shop. Just tap the icon in the upper left corner of your Nintendo 3DS HOME Menu to get started. Tap any Fire Emblem™ character from the Super Smash Bros.™ series of amiibo to the New Nintendo 3DS™ XL system or Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer accessory to add them to your team and play as them in battle! Each character adds a new dimension to gameplay by wielding weaponry pulled straight from the Fire Emblem series—like Marth’s sacred sword, the Falchion, or Ike’s blessed blade, Ragnell. If they fall in battle, amiibo characters must be tapped again in order to add them back to your team.

ES.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
ES.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. es un nuevo juego de estrategia para Nintendo 3DS y 2DS de Intelligent Systems, desarrolladores de las series Fire Emblem y Advance Wars. El juego tiene una atmósfera única con una ambientación steampunk y estilo de novela gráfica. El jugador selecciona cuatro miembros de un equipo de agentes, cada uno con su propia personalidad, y liderados por el 16º presidente de los Estados Unidos, Abraham Lincoln. Juntos lucharán contra los alienígenas invasores. Visita amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar la lista de amiibo™ compatibles y la información más reciente. El lector/grabador de NFC para Nintendo 3DS estará disponible más adelante este año.

HK.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
HK.description: 利用蒸氣技術擊破危險的外星人！ 指揮由無名英雄Abraham Lincoln組成的攻擊隊伍保衛地球，以防外星人侵襲！在這動作遊戲裡利用蒸氣的力量偵察、突擊、消滅敵人。只有您才可以智勝這場威脅。趕快消滅他們吧，特工們！

IT.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
IT.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. è un nuovo titolo di strategia per Nintendo 3DS e 2DS, creato da Intelligent Systems, conosciuti per le serie Fire Emblem e Advance Wars. Il gioco presenta un'atmosfera unica dall'ambientazione in stile steampunk e con grafiche in stile fumetto. Il giocatore sceglie quattro membri da una squadra di agenti, ognuno con la sua personalità unica; guidati dal 16° presidente degli Stati Uniti d'America, Abraham Lincoln, dovranno combattere contro gli alieni che stanno invadendo il pianeta! Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS. Il lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS sarà disponibile quest'anno.

movies.name: Code name: S.T.E.A.M.: trailer di lancio
Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.: trailer Prove di canto

KR.name: CODE NAME: S.T.E.A.M. (코드네임: 스팀)
KR.description: ・ 스팀 파워로 에일리언을 격퇴하라! 때는 19세기, 고도로 발전한 증기 기관으로 비행선도 하늘에 띄우는 또 하나의 세계가 모험의 무대이다. 갑작스러운 에일리언의 침략으로 각국은 큰 혼란에 빠지게 되는데…… 미합중국 대통령 링컨은 에일리언을 격퇴하기 위해 ‘S.T.E.A.M.’이라는 정예 부대를 결성, 적들과 맞서 싸우게 된다. S.T.E.A.M.의 대원들은 문학 작품이나 민간 전승에서 튀어나온 아메리칸 히어로들! 스팀의 힘으로 에일리언과 싸우자! ・ 스팀 파워로 배틀! 턴제 슈팅 시뮬레이션 최대 4명의 S.T.E.A.M. 대원과 에이리언들이 번갈아 행동하며 슈팅 배틀을 펼치는 턴제 시뮬레이션 게임입니다. 이동과 공격의 원천은 대원의 등에 장착된 보일러! 스팀을 모두 소비하면 다음 턴까지 행동할 수 없습니다. ・ 잠복 공격(오버워치)이 배틀의 열쇠 턴제 시뮬레이션 배틀의 열쇠를 쥐는 것은 잠복 공격(오버워치). 보일러에 스팀을 남겨 둔 상태에서 에일리언이 지나갈 것으로 보이는 통로에 시선을 두고 대기시켜 주세요. 시야에 에일리언이 들어온 순간 자동으로 발포하여 공격합니다. 잘 활용하면 상대의 행동을 막을 수도 있습니다. ・ 로컬 통신과 인터넷 통신으로 통신 대전을 즐기자 게임에서 동료가 된 대원으로 자신의 팀을 결성하고 장비를 편성. 가까이 있는 플레이어와의 대전 및 전 세계 플레이어와의 인터넷 대전을 즐길 수 있습니다.

JP.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. リンカーンVSエイリアン
JP.description: 本作は、ターン制のシミュレーションゲームのシステムをベースとして、戦場を自由に移動し、敵に攻撃を仕掛けるシューティング要素を加えたゲームです。スチームパンクな時代設定、アメリカンコミック調のグラフィックといった独特の世界観の中で、リンカーン大統領率いる極秘部隊を操作しながら、地球を侵略するエイリアンを撃退します。 キャラクターの移動や、攻撃などすべてにスチーム、つまり“蒸気”が必要となっており、プレイヤーは特徴の異なる隊員たちから4人選び、出撃し、このスチームを駆使して戦闘を繰り広げながら、ミッションクリアを目指します。4人がもつ限りあるスチーム量を、移動や、攻撃、オーバーウォッチ(待ち伏せ攻撃)にどう配分するかが、勝敗のカギをにぎります。 また、ファイアーエムブレムシリーズのamiibo、「マルス」、「アイク」、「ルキナ」、「ルフレ」をNewニンテンドー3DS/3DS LL本体にタッチすると、ゲストキャラとしてゲーム内に登場させて操作することもできます。 ■使用できるamiibo マルス、アイク、ルキナ、ルフレ ■amiiboでできること データの読み込み （ゲーム内のミッションに参加させて操作できる。シングルプレイ･対戦プレイのどちらにも対応） ※amiiboはNewニンテンドー3DS/3DS LLでのみ使用できます。ニンテンドー3DS/3DS LLでamiiboを使用するには、「ニンテンドー3DS NFCリーダー/ライター」が必要です。 ※本作は、拡張スライドパッドに対応しています。

LT.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
LT.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. is a new strategy game for Nintendo 3DS and 2DS from Intelligent Systems, known for the Fire Emblem and Advance Wars series. The game has a unique atmosphere with a steampunk setting and comic book-style graphics. The player selects four members from a team of agents, each with their own unique personalities – led by the 16th president of the United States of America, Abraham Lincoln – to fight back against aliens invading the planet. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required. The Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer will be available later this year.

LU.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
LU.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. est un nouveau jeu de stratégie sur Nintendo 3DS et 2DS signé Intelligent Systems, qu'on connait pour être à l'origine des séries Fire Emblem et Advance Wars. Ce jeu possède une atmosphère unique mêlant le style steampunk aux graphismes de BD. Le joueur choisit quatre membres parmi une équipe d'agents, chacun possédant sa propre personnalité, qui seront menés par le 16e président des États Unis d'Amérique, Abraham Lincoln, pour combattre une invasion d'aliens sur la planète. Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS. Le lecteur/enregistreur NFC pour Nintendo 3DS sera disponible dans le courant de l'année.

The game has a unique atmosphere with a steampunk setting and comic book-style graphics. MX.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
MX.description: Comanda un grupo de ataque reunido por Abraham Lincoln y conformado por inesperados héroes para defender a la tierra de la invasión alienígena. Aprovecha el poder del vapor para explorar, sorprender e inhabilitar enemigos en esta combinación estelar de juego de estrategia y acción por turnos. Solo tú tienes la capacidad para superar con inteligencia y armas a esta amenaza de otro mundo. ¡Eliminémoslos, agentes! Toca la pantalla táctil de la consola New Nintendo 3DS™ XL o el lector/grabador de NFC para Nintendo 3DS con cualquier personaje de Fire Emblem™ de la serie de amiibo para Super Smash Bros.™ para agregarlos a tu equipo y jugar con ellos en los combates. Combate a través del mundo en campos de batalla infestados por alienígenas con un equipo de cuatro miembros compuesto de diversos personajes como el héroe John Henry, Tom Sawyer y ¿el león de Oz? Cada personaje tiene un arma y habilidad única, así que tendrás que utilizar su resistencia estratégicamente mientras te refugias, preparas emboscadas y desencadenas contraataques. Tú decides la mejor manera de usar el poder de vapor para realizar acciones heroicas. Es Lincoln contra los alienígenas y no me gustaría ser el alienígena. Mira el tema inspirado en este juego en la tienda de temas. Simplemente toca el icono en la esquina superior izquierda del menú HOME de tu consola Nintendo 3DS para comenzar.

NL.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
NL.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. is een nieuwe strategiegame voor de Nintendo 3DS en 2DS van Intelligent Systems, de studio die ook de Fire Emblem- en Advance Wars-series op zijn naam heeft staan. De game heeft een unieke atmosfeer dankzij de steampunk-setting en stripboekachtige graphics. De speler stelt een team van vier agenten samen, die elk hun eigen persoonlijkheden hebben. Het team moet onder leiding van Abraham Lincoln, de zestiende president van de Verenigde Staten, de strijd aanbinden met buitenaardse wezens die de planeet proberen te veroveren. Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig. De NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS zal later dit jaar beschikbaar komen.

PT.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
PT.description: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. é um novo jogo de estratégia para as consolas Nintendo 3DS e Nintendo 2DS que nos chega pelas mãos da Intelligent Systems, a responsável pelas séries Fire Emblem e Advance Wars. O jogo apresenta uma atmosfera singular com um cenário "steampunk" e gráficos ao estilo de banda desenhada. O jogador seleciona quatro membros de uma equipa de agentes, cada um com as suas personalidades únicas, liderada pelo 16.º presidente dos Estados Unidos da América: Abraham Lincoln. O objetivo é impedir a invasão do planeta por extraterrestres. Aceda a amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar a lista de amiibo™ compatíveis e as informações mais recentes. Para usar os amiibo com as Consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS, é necessário um leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS. O leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS estará disponível ainda este ano.

movies.name: Code name: S.T.E.A.M.: Trailer de lançamento
Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.: Trailer em música

RU.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Code Name: S.T.E.A.M. — это новая стратегия для Nintendo 3DS и 2DS от студии Intelligent Systems, которая известна такими играми, как Fire Emblem и Advance Wars. Игра обладает уникальной атмосферой стимпанка и графикой, выполненной в стиле комиксов. Игрок выбирает четыре персонажа из команды агентов, каждый из которых обладает уникальным характером. Руководит ими Авраам Линкольн, 16-й президент США. Ваша задача — отразить вторжение инопланетян. Посетите amiibo.nintendo.eu для получения информации о совместимых amiibo™ и прочей актуальной информации. Чтобы использовать amiibo с системами Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL или Nintendo 2DS, необходимо устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS. Устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS станет доступным в течение этого года.

TW.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
TW.description: 利用蒸氣技術擊破危險的外星人！ 指揮由無名英雄Abraham Lincoln組成的攻擊隊伍保衛地球，以防外星人侵襲！在這動作遊戲裡利用蒸氣的力量偵察、突擊、消滅敵人。只有您才可以智勝這場威脅。趕快消滅他們吧，特工們！

US.name: Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.
US.description: Command a strike team of unexpected heroes - assembled by Abraham Lincoln himself - to defend Earth against an alien invasion! Harness the power of steam to scout, surprise, and annihilate enemies in this star-spangled blend of turn-based strategy and action gameplay. Only you can outwit and outgun this otherworldly threat. Take ‘em out, agents! From the creators of the critically-acclaimed Fire Emblem and Advance Wars series comes a new take on tactical strategy. Battle through globe-spanning, alien-infested battlefields using a customizable four-member team comprised of diverse characters including folk-hero John Henry, Tom Sawyer and.. the lion from Oz!? Each character has a unique weapon and ability, so you’ll have to strategically manage their steam gauges as you take cover, set up ambushes, and unleash counter-attacks. It’s up to you to decide the best way to use your available steam power to perform heroic actions. It’s Lincoln vs aliens… and I wouldn’t want to be the aliens. Check out the theme inspired by this game in the Theme Shop. Just tap the icon in the upper left corner of your Nintendo 3DS HOME Menu to get started. Tap any Fire Emblem™ character from the Super Smash Bros.™ series of amiibo to the New Nintendo 3DS™ XL system or Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer accessory to add them to your team and play as them in battle! Each character adds a new dimension to gameplay by wielding weaponry pulled straight from the Fire Emblem series—like Marth’s sacred sword, the Falchion, or Ike’s blessed blade, Ragnell. If they fall in battle, amiibo characters must be tapped again in order to add them back to your team.
